Works Perfectly on kmeaw 3.55, it comes with a patch on the file named "PATCH", just install it and use the last version of Multiman 1.17.02. If Multiman asks to change the param.sfo just pick YES and go. 
Do not forget to enable your web on the ps3 and disable the auto-logon of the psn account, then when the game asks for login, just press circle and it'll skip it.
